description:
Narihira is quite the ladies’ man, but when the bride to be of emperor catches his eye, he begins to change.  Yukihira, his oldest brother, was always the opposite when it came to love.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takaiko and Narihira: The Honorable Ariwara no Narihira / Yukihira and Hiroko: The Councilor Yukihira
Takaiko to Narihira: Ariwara no Narihira Choushin / Yukihira to Hiroko: Chuunagon Yukihira
高子と業平 在原業平朝臣 / 行平と弘子 中納言行平
